name: Broken Brakes (Skinner Space)
description:
Your brakes are broken, try to destroy as many cars as you can before you die!

Drive through a green light - increase speed

Drive through a red light - decrease speed

You must dash at a side or back of a car to destroy it

CONTROLS

Move - WASD or arrows

Start - space

off/on music - M

Made especially for the Mid-Jam 2021 - "Color Matters" & "Can't Stop"
